name: Method activatePrescription to activate a prescription
description:
The `activatePrescription(<prescriptionHash>)` method in the SDK scans the prescription, links it to the authenticated user, and activates it in FibriCheck Cloud.  
This method takes the prescription hash as a parameter. The prescription hash is can be obtained by:
- scanning a QR code that has been shared with the user out-of-band.
- fetching a hash through FibriCheck Cloud API methods.

This function can throw 2 errors: 
- `NotPaidError`: A paying prescription has not yet been paid.
- `AlreadyActivatedError`: The prescription has already been used.
